833420.name: Sure Footing: Official Soundtrack
833420.description:
The official soundtrack to Sure Footing by Eli Rainsberry with album art by Jonas Sundberg. 14 tracks covering the sectors of Computra, the attacks of Ramrafstar and some extra music too!
Full track listing includes:

  • Behind Those Doors (Main Menu)
  • Keep Running!! (Cacheville)
  • Pay (& Play) Your Respects (K-SAN)
  • Huh, Cool Place (Pixeley)
  • Powering Through (LAN-DN)
  • Communication Central (SID-NEE)
  • Hyper Accelerated Logarithm (HAL)
  • ...How Long Have We Been Running (Logiciel)
  • Here He Is!! (RM-RF*)
  • Sight & Sound (iCity)
  • M e d i t a t e (ND-AH)
  • Close to Completion (Memoria)
  • Did It. (Credits)
  • Do We Have To Do All This Again Now (Trailer)
833420.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语, 德语, 韩语, 俄语
*具有完全音频支持的语言
